page.title: 12THE CURRY FARM 4
page.content: {THE FAMILY Mr.Curry senior is in his eighties and Mrs.Curry senior is in her seventies. They have{four}grown up children _{ {three}sons and{one}daughter. The eldest and youngest sons are both working on the farm.The eldest is a keen photographer.He is also a member of a sub_aqua club and has his own boat.The middle son is a{vet}who is working in England.The daughter is married and living near Holywood,Co. Down.The three boys went to{ {Ballyrashane Primary School}and later boarded at{Campbell College}in Belfast.The daughter went to{The Irish {Society}and later boarded at{Coleraine {High School}.Mrs. Curry senior used to be a member of{the Women's Institute {(W.I.)}but she gave it up due to deterioration in health.
